author: markphip
msg: (markphip): Add myself as a partial committer for JavaHL as per instructions.

author: lundblad
msg: Make our internal merge code use the EOL style of the 'modified' file
for conflict markers, instead of the platform default EOL style.  Fixes issue
#1325: 'Update conflict markers ignore file's EOL style'.
This often gives consistent line endings even when svn:eol-style is not
(svn_diff3__file_output_conflict): Don't output eol markers after conflict
(svn_diff_file_output_merge): Detect eol style of the modified file
and add that eol sequence to the end of the conflict markers.
when merging files with \n line endings.  Add some tests for merging

author: kou
msg: Encode all subject not only log message.
